title: FS2004 - FSX Dispatch Planner III
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Want to add some more realism to your flights? Bored of just jumping in and flying without any pre-planning? Dispatch Planner could be the product for you.

Adding a realistic pre-flight experience for airline operations, Dispatch Planner creates flight and weather reports for your flights.

A breakdown of fuel, aircraft weights (retrieved from FS), airframe limit weights, flight-plan, weather and other information can be generated for each and every flight in just a few clicks of the mouse.

Now in its third version, the Dispatch Planner line of products have never been better!

Dispatch Planner III is the name for the standalone and updated version of Dispatch Planner 2.0. Improved in almost every single way upon the Dispatch Planner 1.0 versions and with a brand new user interface, Dispatch Planner is now better than ever and not limited to certain airlines! Dispatches can now be created for any flight! The improved user interface makes it easier than ever

for you to create and print a dispatch in just a few minutes! The 'Weather Centre' means that Dispatch Planner is no longer restricted to just producing a single dispatch sheet. Weather reports including METARs (aviation routine weather reports) and TAFs

(Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts) can now be retrieved and printed on a weather report sheet.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More Info: simmarket dot com
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
